amendment.description: To fund a U.N. Peacekeeping force in Darfur and to address the shortfalls in the U.S. Contributions to the United Nations for international peacekeeping missions in 13 countries.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3777 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3777 proposed by Senator Menendez. (consideration: CR S3886-3889; text as modified: CR S3886) To fund a U.N. Peacekeeping force in Darfur and to address the shortfalls in the U.S. Contributions to the United Nations for international peacekeeping missions in 13 countries.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3777 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3777 proposed by Senator Menendez.
